name: Shrt Memory
description:
One is designed to train&test your short-term memory. It is so casual and so simple, you can barely call it "a game".(Ha-ha)

It'll only ask you to repeat a small numeral sequence. That easy! But the sequence will be shown for only a second.

So it is recommended not to blink... And it is better not to yawn...

In a nutshell: remember precisely, think quickly, click surely.

Behind the scenes

Inspired by science videos of Japanese researches about chimp's memory. Surprisingly, our little brothers have better (or different?) short-term memory then humans. They would easily beat this game. So what about us?
